name: MC Hammeron and the Passage to FUNK
name_original: MC Hammeron and the Passage to FUNK
description:
You play as MC Hammeron, the current stand-in for the ferryman of the underworld, Charon. Fight your way through hoards of unwilling undead and row to the beat of your heart.

Controls: -W/A/S/D: movement -UP + J: mic boom (short reach) -DOWN + J: leg sweep (negative knockback) -J: poke (low damage) -K: special attack (consumes meter) -L: dash -M: mount/dismount boat (only when on shore) -UP/DOWN + N: change river track -N: row (charges meter when on beat [the rock in the HUD])

Install instructions: Download both the executable and the pck file into the same directory
